title: Legend of Grimrock 2 (v.2.2.4 + Bonus Content, MULTI2) - FitGirl
description:
Legend of Grimrock 2 (v.2.2.4 + Bonus Content, MULTI2) [FitGirl Repack]


::Information::


Release Date: October 15, 2014; v2.2.4 - March 18 , 2015
Genres/Tags: RPG, Dungeon crawl, First-person, 3D, Round-based
Developer: Almost Human
Publisher: Almost Human
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: in-house
Steam User Rating: 93% of user reviews are positive (based on 1,084 reviews)

Interface Language: Russian (v2.1.18), English (v2.2.4)
Audio Language: English
Crack: CODEX for v2.1.18 / DRM-free for v2.2.4

Minimum requirements:
Operating System: Windows XP
Processor: Dual Core 2.33 GHz Intel or 3.0 GHz AMD
RAM: 2 GB
Video Card: Geforce GTX 8800, AMD Radeon 4850 or Intel HD Graphics 5200 or better (1GB graphics memory or more. Shader Model 3.0 needs to be supported). Minimum supported resolutions 1280?720 and 1024?768.
DirectX: 9.0c
HDD Space: 1.1 GB (+419 MB in Windows user docs folder if you will install custom dungeons)


::Repack Features::

Based on GOG v2.2.4 release and Steam-rip v2.1.18 (Russian)
Russian language is enabled for v2.1.18 only
MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Game soundtrack, island map, game manual & other stuff added to Extras folder
Optionally you can install 20 user custom dungeons (they'll be placed into your user documents folder)
Smaller archive size (compressed from 1.5 GB to 826 MB)
Installation takes 3-4 minutes
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 1.1 GB + 419 MB in Windows user docs folder (optional)
OST, Island Map & Custom Dungeons - courtesy of m3Zz from cs.rin.ru - thank you, mate!
Repack by FitGirl
